H0.text: What product is the Singer company well-known for making. Sewing Machines

H1.text: What product is the Singer company well-known for making. Embroidery Machines

H2.text: What product is the Singer company well-known for making. Irons

H3.text: What product is the Singer company well-known for making. Needle feed

A4.text: Singer patented the Singer Vibrating Shuttle sewing machine in 1885.

A5.text: The first electric machines were developed by Singer Sewing Co. and introduced in 1889.
